titleStmt.title: Farewell myter, or, Canterbwies meditations and Wrenn's syllogismes also the divels moane for the discontent of his servants and assistants, and his epitaphs upon each of their burials : together with his chronicles for their hereafter memories, inserted the 13 day of the moneth Tridemiter, according to the infernall collateration ... / by Richard Newrobe.
titleStmt.author: Newrobe, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
